title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Hypermedia-Based Short-Intensive Wushu Basics Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary exercise experience and adaptability to online learning environments
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform the five basic Wushu stances (Ma Bu, Gong Bu, Hu Bu, Du Li Bu, Zhan Zhuang) with accurate biomechanical principles
Learners can design step-by-step learning pathways with 80% accuracy using hypermedia-linked video-image-text content
Learners can correct technical errors by over 70% within three attempts through a real-time feedback system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
